backend/main.mo: Defines song types and storage with access‑controlled endpoints for uploading public/personal songs and querying personal ownership.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing sidebar hamburger‑menu related features and the files they modify.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High‑level summaries of many frontend files describing their roles and recent UI or logic updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes and applying global color and border defaults.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML with Fourleaf branding, root container, and main script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toast system.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that checks login and admin status, showing login or access‑request UI when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/GrantAdmin: Admin UI allowing entry and validation of a Principal ID to grant admin access, with mutation handling and feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequestAdm: Displays an admin access denial card showing the user's principal and a copy-to-clipboard button, with loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/SongEditor: Dialog for creating or editing public songs with form fields, validation, audio metadata extraction, and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button that toggles sign-in or sign-out using Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Fourlea: Renders the Fourleaf logo in full, compact, or icon variants using SVG graphics.
frontend/src/components/catalog/CatalogS: Row card displaying song info with play controls, cover art, duration, and a download button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/Download: Download button that checks authentication and subscription status, then fetches and saves the song’s audio blob.
frontend/src/components/catalog/PublicSo: Dialog for uploading public songs with authentication checks, validation, audio metadata extraction, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/home/HorizontalS: Horizontal scroll container providing snap scrolling for child elements.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingCa: A clickable song card that triggers audio playback with transition context and displays cover art, title, and artist.
frontend/src/components/home/StreamingSe: A layout section with a title, optional icon, optional Show All button, and child content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout combining sidebar, header, content outlet, audio player bar, and optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderSea: Header search bar with home navigation, search input, and a browse menu supporting keyboard and click interactions.
frontend/src/components/layout/HomeTabBa: A tab bar for switching between All, Music, and Podcast browsing categories.
frontend/src/components/layout/LeftSideb: Collapsible sidebar with navigation links, admin check, mobile drawer behavior, and UI sound interactions.
frontend/src/components/layout/RightDeta: Right-side panel showing details of the currently playing song or a placeholder when nothing is playing.
frontend/src/components/personal/Persona: Dialog for authenticated users to upload personal songs with validation, metadata entry, file inputs, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/player/AudioPlay: Audio player bar managing playback, streaming blobs, timing, volume, and queue interactions using useAudioQueue.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and subscription status, then saving their profile.
frontend/src/components/settings/UISound: UI sound settings panel allowing toggling sound effects and adjusting their volume.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioQueue.ts: Zustand store managing audio queue state, playback flags, timing, navigation, and now‑playing UI context.
frontend/src/hooks/useHeaderSearch.ts: Zustand store for managing the header search query with setters and a clear function.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomeBrowsing.ts: Zustand store tracking the active home tab and scroll‑to‑browsing triggers with reset support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating song data, user profiles, and uploads using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISounds.ts: Implements a hook that loads a UI click sound and exposes a play function respecting sound settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useUISoundSettings.ts: Provides a zustand store for UI sound preferences with persistence for enabling and adjusting volume.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for themes, utilities, animations, and layout helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin interface for managing songs, including listing, uploading, editing, and deleting tracks.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays the public song library with search, filtering, recommendations, and playback integration.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: User-specific library for personal songs with login prompts, filtering, playback, upload, and removal.
frontend/src/pages/NowPlayingPage.tsx: A full-screen now-playing UI that displays song details, artwork, playback controls, and handles seeking, volume, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/PlayerLayoutPage.tsx: A layout page with sidebar navigation, hero section, playback controls, and sample track list integrated with the audio queue.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: A pricing plans page that renders subscription tiers with features, discounts, and trial buttons.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Normalizes backend error messages into user-friendly strings with special handling for common error types.
frontend/src/utils/buildSongUpdate.ts: Builds a typed song update payload, conditionally adding optional fields for correct Candid encoding.
frontend/src/utils/uploadValidation.ts: Provides validation utilities for audio files, cover images, durations, and required fields with size limits.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended animations, fonts, and glow shadows, and enables typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and feature requests focused on adding and styling a green hamburger icon for sidebar toggle behavior.
